resources.string: Professional Software Engineer/developer with excellent communication skills, who is analytical and detail-oriented. Adept at bringing the entire team together to accomplish a task on schedule and on a limited budget. Dedicated to providing clients with practical and simple-to-use software solutions

I am confident that I would be a great fit for this role due to my 3+ years of experience in the field of android engineering and my eagerness to help the development your company. 
 I have a proven and successful track record during my time at my current company. I worked with teams and provided end-to-end solutions for clients. 
 I also Lead developers to develop key projects for major clients(market place and aegis rider and autopart e-commerce app) 
 In my resume, you can find more information on the skills and qualifications I would bring to the table, such as: Kotlin/Java Android Studio Fluent in kotlin coroutines Proficient in MVVM architecture Google material design component(MDC) Dependency Injection with Hilt Jetpack Compose libraries Room database/ Datastore Retrofit SDK Git
